author: Jessica
excerpt: Since I do these posts weekly, I’m very aware of how many weeks are left in the year! This is crazy. To start the week, we had a lot of bananas on their last leg. The sky Tuesday was incredible. The weather was wild. It was in the 60s one day. And then snowing the […]
text: Since I do these posts weekly, I’m very aware of how many weeks are left in the year! This is crazy. To start the week, we had a lot of bananas on their last leg. The sky Tuesday was incredible. The weather was wild. It was in the 60s one day. And then snowing the next! Locked in to painting his nutcracker. He loves painting these and displaying them in his room! My mom and I had a show this week! MJ the musical. The cast was incredible. I didn’t love the premise of the show but the cast was unreal. Woke up to snow! Super happy for it! Took many walks in the snow! In Max’s old snowsuit, Max’s old boots, Emilia’s old hat… I love it! She is so funny. She walked all over the house with a measuring tape measuring everything she could. Jordy and I both ended up sick this week. Good thing he got an antibiotic since I couldn’t get him off of playing on the floor at urgent care. Ugh. She is the best. Hockey this weekend! Love this one of him chasing the puck. Cutest. I am dying. Emilia took a picture of what she built with the nugget couches. This is how she returned my phone – with this pose!! I have no idea where she learned it. I could not stop laughing. More hockey today!! Look at that blade on the ice! And I made a gigantic batch of chex mix today. Getting ready for Thanksgiving week!!
html:
Since I do these posts weekly, I’m very aware of how many weeks are left in the year!

This is crazy.

To start the week, we had a lot of bananas on their last leg.

The sky Tuesday was incredible.

The weather was wild. It was in the 60s one day.

And then snowing the next!

Locked in to painting his nutcracker. He loves painting these and displaying them in his room!

My mom and I had a show this week! MJ the musical. The cast was incredible. I didn’t love the premise of the show but the cast was unreal.

Woke up to snow!

Super happy for it!

Took many walks in the snow! In Max’s old snowsuit, Max’s old boots, Emilia’s old hat… I love it!

She is so funny.

She walked all over the house with a measuring tape measuring everything she could.

Jordy and I both ended up sick this week. Good thing he got an antibiotic since I couldn’t get him off of playing on the floor at urgent care. Ugh.

She is the best.

Hockey this weekend!

Love this one of him chasing the puck.

Cutest.

I am dying. Emilia took a picture of what she built with the nugget couches. This is how she returned my phone – with this pose!!

I have no idea where she learned it. I could not stop laughing.

More hockey today!! Look at that blade on the ice!

And I made a gigantic batch of chex mix today. Getting ready for Thanksgiving week!!
